lines.text: I was born in Chateau D'or, Switzerland. I was born on November 17th, 1960, the doctor's name was Geneste. I was raised by Angelina and Felix D'Arsae until they were murdered. They always told me my real mother would come for me someday... She never did.
They sent me to hell... I'll teach them what I learned there!
Tell him to get get stuffed!
It means if his highness would like to dance with this charming young lady, he can come over and ask her himself
No! No, the child was killed! It is dead!
Incidentally, which one of you bitches is my mother?
